story.text: Evolution of Incident Management at Slack. Brent Chapman @ SRECon2021. Learn how we've made incident management a core capability of everyone on our engineering team: where we are, how we got here, and where we're going. Brent has basically given everyone a roadmap to building an effective incident response program. [https://www.usenix.org/conference/srecon21/presentation/chapman usenix] [https://www.usenix.org/system/files/srecon21_slides_chapman.pdf pdf] [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FYYTglQoS3w youtube]
